projects.title: Lexy
projects.bodyText: A lightweight command-line interface (CLI) tool that fetches programming tutorials from Learn X in Y Minutes directly into your terminal. Quickly search, learn, and reference code examples without leaving your workflow

projects.title: VRnatomy
projects.bodyText: An immersive AR/VR app offering interactive 3D exploration of human anatomy for enhanced learning and visualization.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText: A personal portfolio built with HTML, CSS, and Node.js to showcase projects, skills and experience with an interactive and responsive design, highlighting both frontend and backend development.

projects.title: SnakeByte
projects.bodyText: A Snake game in Pygame where the player guides a snake to eat food and grow longer while avoiding collisions with walls or itself. It showcases basic game loops, rendering and collision detection.

projects.title: Codem
projects.bodyText: A Social Media app built in C++ that lets users create profiles, post content, and connect with others through features like likes, comments and messaging. It highlights object-oriented design, data structures and file handling.

projects.title: Space Ranger
projects.bodyText: A fast-paced shooting game built with Python, featuring real-time target interaction and dynamic scoring
